GV01rv_hn03u:980: RV_3,053.05c yatrā rathasya bṛhato nidhānaṃ vimocanaṃ vājino rāsabhasya //
GV01rv_hn03u:981: RV_3,053.06a apāḥ somam astam indra pra yāhi kalyāṇīr jāyā suraṇaṃ gṛhe te /
GV01rv_hn03u:982: RV_3,053.06c yatrā rathasya bṛhato nidhānaṃ vimocanaṃ vājino dakṣiṇāvat //
GV01rv_hn03u:983: RV_3,053.07a ime bhojā aṅgiraso virūpā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:984: RV_3,053.07c viśvāmitrāya dadato maghāni sahasrasāve pra tiranta āyuḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:985: RV_3,053.08a rūpaṃ-rūpam maghavā bobhavīti māyāḥ kṛṇvānas tanvam pari svām /
GV01rv_hn03u:986: RV_3,053.08c trir yad divaḥ pari muhūrtam āgāt svair mantrair anṛtupā ṛtāvā //
GV01rv_hn03u:987: RV_3,053.09a mahāṃ ṛṣir devajā devajūto 'stabhnāt sindhum arṇavaṃ nṛcakṣāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:988: RV_3,053.09c viśvāmitro yad avahat sudāsam apriyāyata kuśikebhir indraḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:989: RV_3,053.10a haṃsā iva kṛṇutha ślokam adribhir madanto gīrbhir adhvare sute sacā /
GV01rv_hn03u:990: RV_3,053.10c devebhir viprā ṛṣayo nṛcakṣaso vi pibadhvaṃ kuśikāḥ somyam madhu //
GV01rv_hn03u:991: RV_3,053.11a upa preta kuśikāś cetayadhvam aśvaṃ rāye pra muñcatā sudāsaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:992: RV_3,053.11c rājā vṛtraṃ jaṅghanat prāg apāg udag athā yajāte vara ā pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:993: RV_3,053.12a ya ime rodasī ubhe aham indram atuṣṭavam /
GV01rv_hn03u:994: RV_3,053.12c viśvāmitrasya rakṣati brahmedam bhārataṃ janam //
GV01rv_hn03u:997: RV_3,053.14a kiṃ te kṛṇvanti kīkaṭeṣu gāvo nāśiraṃ duhre na tapanti gharmam /
GV01rv_hn03u:998: RV_3,053.14c ā no bhara pramagandasya vedo naicāśākham maghavan randhayā naḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:999: RV_3,053.15a sasarparīr amatim bādhamānā bṛhan mimāya jamadagnidattā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1000: RV_3,053.15c ā sūryasya duhitā tatāna śravo deveṣv amṛtam ajuryam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1001: RV_3,053.16a sasarparīr abharat tūyam ebhyo 'dhi śravaḥ pāñcajanyāsu kṛṣṭiṣu /
GV01rv_hn03u:1002: RV_3,053.16c sā pakṣyā navyam āyur dadhānā yām me palastijamadagnayo daduḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1003: RV_3,053.17a sthirau gāvau bhavatāṃ vīḷur akṣo meṣā vi varhi mā yugaṃ vi śāri /
GV01rv_hn03u:1004: RV_3,053.17c indraḥ pātalye dadatāṃ śarītor ariṣṭaneme abhi naḥ sacasva //
GV01rv_hn03u:1005: RV_3,053.18a balaṃ dhehi tanūṣu no balam indrānaḷutsu naḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1006: RV_3,053.18c balaṃ tokāya tanayāya jīvase tvaṃ hi baladā asi //
GV01rv_hn03u:1007: RV_3,053.19a abhi vyayasva khadirasya sāram ojo dhehi spandane śiṃśapāyām /
GV01rv_hn03u:1008: RV_3,053.19c akṣa vīḷo vīḷita vīḷayasva mā yāmād asmād ava jīhipo naḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1009: RV_3,053.20a ayam asmān vanaspatir mā ca hā mā ca rīriṣat /
GV01rv_hn03u:1010: RV_3,053.20c svasty ā gṛhebhya āvasā ā vimocanāt //
GV01rv_hn03u:1011: RV_3,053.21a indrotibhir bahulābhir no adya yācchreṣṭhābhir maghavañ chūra jinva /
GV01rv_hn03u:1012: RV_3,053.21c yo no dveṣṭy adharaḥ sas padīṣṭa yam u dviṣmas tam u prāṇo jahātu //
GV01rv_hn03u:1013: RV_3,053.22a paraśuṃ cid vi tapati śimbalaṃ cid vi vṛścati /
GV01rv_hn03u:1014: RV_3,053.22c ukhā cid indra yeṣantī prayastā phenam asyati //
GV01rv_hn03u:1015: RV_3,053.23a na sāyakasya cikite janāso lodhaṃ nayanti paśu manyamānāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1016: RV_3,053.23c nāvājinaṃ vājinā hāsayanti na gardabham puro aśvān nayanti //
GV01rv_hn03u:1017: RV_3,053.24a ima indra bharatasya putrā apapitvaṃ cikitur na prapitvam /
GV01rv_hn03u:1018: RV_3,053.24c hinvanty aśvam araṇaṃ na nityaṃ jyāvājam pari ṇayanty ājau //
GV01rv_hn03u:1019: RV_3,054.01a imam mahe vidathyāya śūṣaṃ śaśvat kṛtva īḍyāya pra jabhruḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1020: RV_3,054.01c śṛṇotu no damyebhir anīkaiḥ śṛṇotv agnir divyair ajasraḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1021: RV_3,054.02a mahi mahe dive arcā pṛthivyai kāmo ma icchañ carati prajānan /
GV01rv_hn03u:1022: RV_3,054.02c yayor ha stome vidatheṣu devāḥ saparyavo mādayante sacāyoḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1023: RV_3,054.03a yuvor ṛtaṃ rodasī satyam astu mahe ṣu ṇaḥ suvitāya pra bhūtam /
GV01rv_hn03u:1024: RV_3,054.03c idaṃ dive namo agne pṛthivyai saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1025: RV_3,054.04a uto hi vām pūrvyā āvividra ṛtāvarī rodasī satyavācaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1026: RV_3,054.04c naraś cid vāṃ samithe śūrasātau vavandire pṛthivi vevidānāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1027: RV_3,054.05a ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocad devāṃ acchā pathyā kā sam eti /
GV01rv_hn03u:1028: RV_3,054.05c dadṛśra eṣām avamā sadāṃsi pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu //
GV01rv_hn03u:1029: RV_3,054.06a kavir nṛcakṣā abhi ṣīm acaṣṭa ṛtasya yonā vighṛte madantī /
GV01rv_hn03u:1030: RV_3,054.06c nānā cakrāte sadanaṃ yathā veḥ samānena kratunā saṃvidāne //
GV01rv_hn03u:1031: RV_3,054.07a samānyā viyute dūreante dhruve pade tasthatur jāgarūke /
GV01rv_hn03u:1032: RV_3,054.07c uta svasārā yuvatī bhavantī ād u bruvāte mithunāni nāma //
GV01rv_hn03u:1033: RV_3,054.08a viśved ete janimā saṃ vivikto maho devān bibhratī na vyathete /
GV01rv_hn03u:1034: RV_3,054.08c ejad dhruvam patyate viśvam ekaṃ carat patatri viṣuṇaṃ vi jātam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1035: RV_3,054.09a sanā purāṇam adhy emy ārān mahaḥ pitur janitur jāmi tan naḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1036: RV_3,054.09c devāso yatra panitāra evair urau pathi vyute tasthur antaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1037: RV_3,054.10a imaṃ stomaṃ rodasī pra bravīmy ṛdūdarāḥ śṛṇavann agnijihvāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1038: RV_3,054.10c mitraḥ samrājo varuṇo yuvāna ādityāsaḥ kavayaḥ paprathānāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1039: RV_3,054.11a hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā sujihvas trir ā divo vidathe patyamānaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1040: RV_3,054.11c deveṣu ca savitaḥ ślokam aśrer ād asmabhyam ā suva sarvatātim //
GV01rv_hn03u:1041: RV_3,054.12a sukṛt supāṇiḥ svavāṃ ṛtāvā devas tvaṣṭāvase tāni no dhāt /
GV01rv_hn03u:1042: RV_3,054.12c pūṣaṇvanta ṛbhavo mādayadhvam ūrdhvagrāvāṇo adhvaram ataṣṭa //
GV01rv_hn03u:1043: RV_3,054.13a vidyudrathā maruta ṛṣṭimanto divo maryā ṛtajātā ayāsaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1044: RV_3,054.13c sarasvatī śṛṇavan yajñiyāso dhātā rayiṃ sahavīraṃ turāsaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1045: RV_3,054.14a viṣṇuṃ stomāsaḥ purudasmam arkā bhagasyeva kāriṇo yāmani gman /
GV01rv_hn03u:1046: RV_3,054.14c urukramaḥ kakuho yasya pūrvīr na mardhanti yuvatayo janitrīḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1047: RV_3,054.15a indro viśvair vīryaiḥ patyamāna ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1048: RV_3,054.15c purandaro vṛtrahā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ saṃgṛbhyā na ā bharā bhūri paśvaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1049: RV_3,054.16a nāsatyā me pitarā bandhupṛcchā sajātyam aśvinoś cāru nāma /
GV01rv_hn03u:1050: RV_3,054.16c yuvaṃ hi stho rayidau no rayīṇāṃ dātraṃ rakṣethe akavair adabdhā //
GV01rv_hn03u:1051: RV_3,054.17a mahat tad vaḥ kavayaś cāru nāma yad dha devā bhavatha viśva indre /
GV01rv_hn03u:1052: RV_3,054.17c sakha ṛbhubhiḥ puruhūta priyebhir imāṃ dhiyaṃ sātaye takṣatā naḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1053: RV_3,054.18a aryamā ṇo aditir yajñiyāso 'dabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni /
GV01rv_hn03u:1054: RV_3,054.18c yuyota no anapatyāni gantoḥ prajāvān naḥ paśumāṃ astu gātuḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1055: RV_3,054.19a devānāṃ dūtaḥ purudha prasūto 'nāgān no vocatu sarvatātā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1056: RV_3,054.19c śṛṇotu naḥ pṛthivī dyaur utāpaḥ sūryo nakṣatrair urv antarikṣam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1057: RV_3,054.20a śṛṇvantu no vṛṣaṇaḥ parvatāso dhruvakṣemāsa iḷayā madantaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1058: RV_3,054.20c ādityair no aditiḥ śṛṇotu yacchantu no marutaḥ śarma bhadram //
GV01rv_hn03u:1059: RV_3,054.21a sadā sugaḥ pitumāṃ astu panthā madhvā devā oṣadhīḥ sam pipṛkta /
GV01rv_hn03u:1060: RV_3,054.21c bhago me agne sakhye na mṛdhyā ud rāyo aśyāṃ sadanam purukṣoḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1061: RV_3,054.22a svadasva havyā sam iṣo didīhy asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi /
GV01rv_hn03u:1062: RV_3,054.22c viśvāṃ agne pṛtsu tāñ jeṣi śatrūn ahā viśvā sumanā dīdihī naḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1063: RV_3,055.01a uṣasaḥ pūrvā adha yad vyūṣur mahad vi jajñe akṣaram pade goḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1064: RV_3,055.01c vratā devānām upa nu prabhūṣan mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1065: RV_3,055.02a mo ṣū ṇo atra juhuranta devā mā pūrve agne pitaraḥ padajñāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1066: RV_3,055.02c purāṇyoḥ sadmanoḥ ketur antar mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1067: RV_3,055.03a vi me purutrā patayanti kāmāḥ śamy acchā dīdye pūrvyāṇi /
GV01rv_hn03u:1068: RV_3,055.03c samiddhe agnāv ṛtam id vadema mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1069: RV_3,055.04a samāno rājā vibhṛtaḥ purutrā śaye śayāsu prayuto vanānu /
GV01rv_hn03u:1070: RV_3,055.04c anyā vatsam bharati kṣeti mātā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1071: RV_3,055.05a ākṣit pūrvāsv aparā anūrut sadyo jātāsu taruṇīṣv antaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1072: RV_3,055.05c antarvatīḥ suvate apravītā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1073: RV_3,055.06a śayuḥ parastād adha nu dvimātābandhanaś carati vatsa ekaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1074: RV_3,055.06c mitrasya tā varuṇasya vratāni mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1075: RV_3,055.07a dvimātā hotā vidatheṣu samrāḷ anv agraṃ carati kṣeti budhnaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1076: RV_3,055.07c pra raṇyāni raṇyavāco bharante mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1077: RV_3,055.08a śūrasyeva yudhyato antamasya pratīcīnaṃ dadṛśe viśvam āyat /
GV01rv_hn03u:1078: RV_3,055.08c antar matiś carati niṣṣidhaṃ gor mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1079: RV_3,055.09a ni veveti palito dūta āsv antar mahāṃś carati rocanena /
GV01rv_hn03u:1080: RV_3,055.09c vapūṃṣi bibhrad abhi no vi caṣṭe mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1081: RV_3,055.10a viṣṇur gopāḥ paramam pāti pāthaḥ priyā dhāmāny amṛtā dadhānaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1082: RV_3,055.10c agniṣ ṭā viśvā bhuvanāni veda mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1083: RV_3,055.11a nānā cakrāte yamyā vapūṃṣi tayor anyad rocate kṛṣṇam anyat /
GV01rv_hn03u:1084: RV_3,055.11c śyāvī ca yad aruṣī ca svasārau mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1085: RV_3,055.12a mātā ca yatra duhitā ca dhenū sabardughe dhāpayete samīcī /
GV01rv_hn03u:1086: RV_3,055.12c ṛtasya te sadasīḷe antar mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1087: RV_3,055.13a anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenur ūdhaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1088: RV_3,055.13c ṛtasya sā payasāpinvateḷā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1089: RV_3,055.14a padyā vaste pururūpā vapūṃṣy ūrdhvā tasthau tryaviṃ rerihāṇā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1090: RV_3,055.14c ṛtasya sadma vi carāmi vidvān mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1091: RV_3,055.15a pade iva nihite dasme antas tayor anyad guhyam āvir anyat /
GV01rv_hn03u:1092: RV_3,055.15c sadhrīcīnā pathyā sā viṣūcī mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1093: RV_3,055.16a ā dhenavo dhunayantām aśiśvīḥ sabardughāḥ śaśayā apradugdhāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1094: RV_3,055.16c navyā-navyā yuvatayo bhavantīr mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1095: RV_3,055.17a yad anyāsu vṛṣabho roravīti so anyasmin yūthe ni dadhāti retaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1096: RV_3,055.17c sa hi kṣapāvān sa bhagaḥ sa rājā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1097: RV_3,055.18a vīrasya nu svaśvyaṃ janāsaḥ pra nu vocāma vidur asya devāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1098: RV_3,055.18c ṣoḷhā yuktāḥ pañca-pañcā vahanti mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1099: RV_3,055.19a devas tvaṣṭā savitā viśvarūpaḥ pupoṣa prajāḥ purudhā jajāna /
GV01rv_hn03u:1100: RV_3,055.19c imā ca viśvā bhuvanāny asya mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1101: RV_3,055.20a mahī sam airac camvā samīcī ubhe te asya vasunā nyṛṣṭe /
GV01rv_hn03u:1102: RV_3,055.20c śṛṇve vīro vindamāno vasūni mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1103: RV_3,055.21a imāṃ ca naḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upa kṣeti hitamitro na rājā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1104: RV_3,055.21c puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1105: RV_3,055.22a niṣṣidhvarīs ta oṣadhīr utāpo rayiṃ ta indra pṛthivī bibharti /
GV01rv_hn03u:1106: RV_3,055.22c sakhāyas te vāmabhājaḥ syāma mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rv_hn03u:1107: RV_3,056.01a na tā minanti māyino na dhīrā vratā devānām prathamā dhruvāṇi /
GV01rv_hn03u:1108: RV_3,056.01c na rodasī adruhā vedyābhir na parvatā niname tasthivāṃsaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1109: RV_3,056.02a ṣaḍ bhārāṃ eko acaran bibharty ṛtaṃ varṣiṣṭham upa gāva āguḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1110: RV_3,056.02c tisro mahīr uparās tasthur atyā guhā dve nihite darśy ekā //
GV01rv_hn03u:1111: RV_3,056.03a tripājasyo vṛṣabho viśvarūpa uta tryudhā purudha prajāvān /
GV01rv_hn03u:1112: RV_3,056.03c tryanīkaḥ patyate māhināvān sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām //
GV01rv_hn03u:1113: RV_3,056.04a abhīka āsām padavīr abodhy ādityānām ahve cāru nāma /
GV01rv_hn03u:1114: RV_3,056.04c āpaś cid asmā aramanta devīḥ pṛthag vrajantīḥ pari ṣīm avṛñjan //
GV01rv_hn03u:1115: RV_3,056.05a trī ṣadhasthā sindhavas triḥ kavīnām uta trimātā vidatheṣu samrāṭ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1116: RV_3,056.05c ṛtāvarīr yoṣaṇās tisro apyās trir ā divo vidathe patyamānāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1117: RV_3,056.06a trir ā divaḥ savitar vāryāṇi dive-diva ā suva trir no ahnaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1118: RV_3,056.06c tridhātu rāya ā suvā vasūni bhaga trātar dhiṣaṇe sātaye dhāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1119: RV_3,056.07a trir ā divaḥ savitā soṣavīti rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī /
GV01rv_hn03u:1120: RV_3,056.07c āpaś cid asya rodasī cid urvī ratnam bhikṣanta savituḥ savāya //
GV01rv_hn03u:1121: RV_3,056.08a trir uttamā dūṇaśā rocanāni trayo rājanty asurasya vīrāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1122: RV_3,056.08c ṛtāvāna iṣirā dūḷabhāsas trir ā divo vidathe santu devāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1123: RV_3,057.01a pra me vivikvāṃ avidan manīṣāṃ dhenuṃ carantīm prayutām agopām /
GV01rv_hn03u:1124: RV_3,057.01c sadyaś cid yā duduhe bhūri dhāser indras tad agniḥ panitāro asyāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1125: RV_3,057.02a indraḥ su pūṣā vṛṣaṇā suhastā divo na prītāḥ śaśayaṃ duduhre /
GV01rv_hn03u:1126: RV_3,057.02c viśve yad asyāṃ raṇayanta devāḥ pra vo 'tra vasavaḥ sumnam aśyām //
GV01rv_hn03u:1127: RV_3,057.03a yā jāmayo vṛṣṇa icchanti śaktiṃ namasyantīr jānate garbham asmin /
GV01rv_hn03u:1128: RV_3,057.03c acchā putraṃ dhenavo vāvaśānā mahaś caranti bibhrataṃ vapūṃṣi //
GV01rv_hn03u:1129: RV_3,057.04a acchā vivakmi rodasī sumeke grāvṇo yujāno adhvare manīṣā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1130: RV_3,057.04c imā u te manave bhūrivārā ūrdhvā bhavanti darśatā yajatrāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1131: RV_3,057.05a yā te jihvā madhumatī sumedhā agne deveṣūcyata urūcī /
GV01rv_hn03u:1132: RV_3,057.05c tayeha viśvāṃ avase yajatrān ā sādaya pāyayā cā madhūni //
GV01rv_hn03u:1133: RV_3,057.06a yā te agne parvatasyeva dhārāsaścantī pīpayad deva citrā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1134: RV_3,057.06c tām asmabhyam pramatiṃ jātavedo vaso rāsva sumatiṃ viśvajanyām //
GV01rv_hn03u:1135: RV_3,058.01a dhenuḥ pratnasya kāmyaṃ duhānāntaḥ putraś carati dakṣiṇāyāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1136: RV_3,058.01c ā dyotaniṃ vahati śubhrayāmoṣasa stomo aśvināv ajīgaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1137: RV_3,058.02a suyug vahanti prati vām ṛtenordhvā bhavanti pitareva medhāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1138: RV_3,058.02c jarethām asmad vi paṇer manīṣāṃ yuvor avaś cakṛmā yātam arvāk //
GV01rv_hn03u:1139: RV_3,058.03a suyugbhir aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena dasrāv imaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokam adreḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1140: RV_3,058.03c kim aṅga vām praty avartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhur viprāso aśvinā purājāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1141: RV_3,058.04a ā manyethām ā gataṃ kac cid evair viśve janāso aśvinā havante /
GV01rv_hn03u:1142: RV_3,058.04c imā hi vāṃ goṛjīkā madhūni pra mitrāso na dadur usro agre //
GV01rv_hn03u:1143: RV_3,058.05a tiraḥ purū cid aśvinā rajāṃsy āṅgūṣo vām maghavānā janeṣu /
GV01rv_hn03u:1144: RV_3,058.05c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair dasrāv ime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām //
GV01rv_hn03u:1145: RV_3,058.06a purāṇam okaḥ sakhyaṃ śivaṃ vāṃ yuvor narā draviṇaṃ jahnāvyām /
GV01rv_hn03u:1146: RV_3,058.06c punaḥ kṛṇvānāḥ sakhyā śivāni madhvā madema saha nū samānāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1147: RV_3,058.07a aśvinā vāyunā yuvaṃ sudakṣā niyudbhiṣ ca sajoṣasā yuvānā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1148: RV_3,058.07c nāsatyā tiroahnyaṃ juṣāṇā somam pibatam asridhā sudānū //
GV01rv_hn03u:1149: RV_3,058.08a aśvinā pari vām iṣaḥ purūcīr īyur gīrbhir yatamānā amṛdhrāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1150: RV_3,058.08c ratho ha vām ṛtajā adrijūtaḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yāti sadyaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1151: RV_3,058.09a aśvinā madhuṣuttamo yuvākuḥ somas tam pātam ā gataṃ duroṇe /
GV01rv_hn03u:1152: RV_3,058.09c ratho ha vām bhūri varpaḥ karikrat sutāvato niṣkṛtam āgamiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1153: RV_3,059.01a mitro janān yātayati bruvāṇo mitro dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām /
GV01rv_hn03u:1154: RV_3,059.01c mitraḥ kṛṣṭīr animiṣābhi caṣṭe mitrāya havyaṃ ghṛtavaj juhota //
GV01rv_hn03u:1155: RV_3,059.02a pra sa mitra marto astu prayasvān yas ta āditya śikṣati vratena /
GV01rv_hn03u:1156: RV_3,059.02c na hanyate na jīyate tvoto nainam aṃho aśnoty antito na dūrāt //
GV01rv_hn03u:1157: RV_3,059.03a anamīvāsa iḷayā madanto mitajñavo varimann ā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1158: RV_3,059.03c ādityasya vratam upakṣiyanto vayam mitrasya sumatau syāma //
GV01rv_hn03u:1159: RV_3,059.04a ayam mitro namasyaḥ suśevo rājā sukṣatro ajaniṣṭa vedhāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1160: RV_3,059.04c tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma //
GV01rv_hn03u:1161: RV_3,059.05a mahāṃ ādityo namasopasadyo yātayajjano gṛṇate suśevaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1162: RV_3,059.05c tasmā etat panyatamāya juṣṭam agnau mitrāya havir ā juhota //
GV01rv_hn03u:1165: RV_3,059.07a abhi yo mahinā divam mitro babhūva saprathāḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1167: RV_3,059.08a mitrāya pañca yemire janā abhiṣṭiśavase /
GV01rv_hn03u:1169: RV_3,059.09a mitro deveṣv āyuṣu janāya vṛktabarhiṣe /
GV01rv_hn03u:1171: RV_3,060.01a iheha vo manasā bandhutā nara uśijo jagmur abhi tāni vedasā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1172: RV_3,060.01c yābhir māyābhiḥ pratijūtivarpasaḥ saudhanvanā yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśa //
GV01rv_hn03u:1173: RV_3,060.02a yābhiḥ śacībhiś camasāṃ apiṃśata yayā dhiyā gām ariṇīta carmaṇaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1174: RV_3,060.02c yena harī manasā niratakṣata tena devatvam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśa //
GV01rv_hn03u:1175: RV_3,060.03a indrasya sakhyam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśur manor napāto apaso dadhanvire /
GV01rv_hn03u:1176: RV_3,060.03c saudhanvanāso amṛtatvam erire viṣṭvī śamībhiḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā //
GV01rv_hn03u:1177: RV_3,060.04a indreṇa yātha sarathaṃ sute sacāṃ atho vaśānām bhavathā saha śriyā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1178: RV_3,060.04c na vaḥ pratimai sukṛtāni vāghataḥ saudhanvanā ṛbhavo vīryāṇi ca //
GV01rv_hn03u:1179: RV_3,060.05a indra ṛbhubhir vājavadbhiḥ samukṣitaṃ sutaṃ somam ā vṛṣasvā gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1180: RV_3,060.05c dhiyeṣito maghavan dāśuṣo gṛhe saudhanvanebhiḥ saha matsvā nṛbhiḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1181: RV_3,060.06a indra ṛbhumān vājavān matsveha no 'smin savane śacyā puruṣṭuta /
GV01rv_hn03u:1182: RV_3,060.06c imāni tubhyaṃ svasarāṇi yemire vratā devānām manuṣaś ca dharmabhiḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1183: RV_3,060.07a indra ṛbhubhir vājibhir vājayann iha stomaṃ jaritur upa yāhi yajñiyam /
GV01rv_hn03u:1184: RV_3,060.07c śataṃ ketebhir iṣirebhir āyave sahasraṇītho adhvarasya homani //
GV01rv_hn03u:1185: RV_3,061.01a uṣo vājena vājini pracetā stomaṃ juṣasva gṛṇato maghoni /
GV01rv_hn03u:1186: RV_3,061.01c purāṇī devi yuvatiḥ purandhir anu vrataṃ carasi viśvavāre //
GV01rv_hn03u:1187: RV_3,061.02a uṣo devy amartyā vi bhāhi candrarathā sūnṛtā īrayantī /
GV01rv_hn03u:1188: RV_3,061.02c ā tvā vahantu suyamāso aśvā hiraṇyavarṇām pṛthupājaso ye //
GV01rv_hn03u:1189: RV_3,061.03a uṣaḥ pratīcī bhuvanāni viśvordhvā tiṣṭhasy amṛtasya ketuḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1190: RV_3,061.03c samānam arthaṃ caraṇīyamānā cakram iva navyasy ā vavṛtsva //
GV01rv_hn03u:1191: RV_3,061.04a ava syūmeva cinvatī maghony uṣā yāti svasarasya patnī /
GV01rv_hn03u:1192: RV_3,061.04c svar janantī subhagā sudaṃsā āntād divaḥ papratha ā pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1193: RV_3,061.05a acchā vo devīm uṣasaṃ vibhātīm pra vo bharadhvaṃ namasā suvṛktim /
GV01rv_hn03u:1194: RV_3,061.05c ūrdhvam madhudhā divi pājo aśret pra rocanā ruruce raṇvasaṃdṛk //
GV01rv_hn03u:1195: RV_3,061.06a ṛtāvarī divo arkair abodhy ā revatī rodasī citram asthāt /
GV01rv_hn03u:1196: RV_3,061.06c āyatīm agna uṣasaṃ vibhātīṃ vāmam eṣi draviṇam bhikṣamāṇaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1197: RV_3,061.07a ṛtasya budhna uṣasām iṣaṇyan vṛṣā mahī rodasī ā viveśa /
GV01rv_hn03u:1198: RV_3,061.07c mahī mitrasya varuṇasya māyā candreva bhānuṃ vi dadhe purutrā //
GV01rv_hn03u:1199: RV_3,062.01a imā u vām bhṛmayo manyamānā yuvāvate na tujyā abhūvan /
GV01rv_hn03u:1200: RV_3,062.01c kva tyad indrāvaruṇā yaśo vāṃ yena smā sinam bharathaḥ sakhibhyaḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1201: RV_3,062.02a ayam u vām purutamo rayīyañ chaśvattamam avase johavīti /
GV01rv_hn03u:1202: RV_3,062.02c sajoṣāv indrāvaruṇā marudbhir divā pṛthivyā śṛṇutaṃ havam me //
GV01rv_hn03u:1203: RV_3,062.03a asme tad indrāvaruṇā vasu ṣyād asme rayir marutaḥ sarvavīraḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1204: RV_3,062.03c asmān varūtrīḥ śaraṇair avantv asmān hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇābhiḥ //
GV01rv_hn03u:1205: RV_3,062.04a bṛhaspate juṣasva no havyāni viśvadevya /
GV01rv_hn03u:1207: RV_3,062.05a śucim arkair bṛhaspatim adhvareṣu namasyata /
GV01rv_hn03u:1211: RV_3,062.07a iyaṃ te pūṣann āghṛṇe suṣṭutir deva navyasī /
GV01rv_hn03u:1213: RV_3,062.08a tāṃ juṣasva giram mama vājayantīm avā dhiyam /
GV01rv_hn03u:1215: RV_3,062.09a yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati /
GV01rv_hn03u:1217: RV_3,062.10a tat savitur vareṇyam bhargo devasya dhīmahi /
GV01rv_hn03u:1219: RV_3,062.11a devasya savitur vayaṃ vājayantaḥ purandhyā /
GV01rv_hn03u:1221: RV_3,062.12a devaṃ naraḥ savitāraṃ viprā yajñaiḥ suvṛktibhiḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1223: RV_3,062.13a somo jigāti gātuvid devānām eti niṣkṛtam /
GV01rv_hn03u:1225: RV_3,062.14a somo asmabhyaṃ dvipade catuṣpade ca paśave /
GV01rv_hn03u:1227: RV_3,062.15a asmākam āyur vardhayann abhimātīḥ sahamānaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1229: RV_3,062.16a ā no mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam /
GV01rv_hn03u:1231: RV_3,062.17a uruśaṃsā namovṛdhā mahnā dakṣasya rājathaḥ /
GV01rv_hn03u:1233: RV_3,062.18a gṛṇānā jamadagninā yonāv ṛtasya sīdatam /
